summary: App update to remove Internet Identity authentication and implement a simple sign-in page with Google and phone number login options.
architectural_notes: Authentication: remove Internet Identity integration; use standard Google OAuth sign-in and phone number (OTP) sign-in flows behind a simplified login UI.

existing_features.title: Update the /account/login page to remove Internet Identity-specific UI and code paths, and replace them with a simple sign-in experience offering (1) a “Continue with Google” button and (2) a phone number sign-in form.

Implement frontend-only behavior for the new Google and phone sign-in options so they allow users to proceed through the app without Internet Identity, using session-based state (e.g., sessionStorage) to remember the chosen sign-in method for the current session.

Update account-related UI copy and flows to align with the new simple sign-in approach (Google/phone), including removing Internet Identity wording from the Account page and any sign-in prompts that route users to /account/login.

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace Internet Identity login with a simple sign-in UI supporting Google sign-in and phone number sign-in; remove all Internet Identity code from the sign-in page.
